attributes.action: To stop heavy good vehicles from using Wesham as a short cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wesham is a small town / village in the Fylde, Lancashire.  We used to have a weight limit on the bridge over the Railway Line.  However, following structure repairs to the bridge this weight restriction has been lifted and HGV's drive through Wesham as a short cut to Kirkham and Preston.  We have a bypass which was built to keep traffic out of Wesham, and now drivers are still travelling through our town.
